title: How to get a PBE account ??
body:
Hello! I believe to have signed up months ago for an account, but I am unsure if I can get another due to getting one already many seasons ago. I mainly play  Ivern and would like to test his nerfs :)

Much love, and sorry for the bad english

replies.body: While we were able to get your application earlier this year, for the moment the pbe signup/creation page is down for maintenance. Be sure to check the [**pbe status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates on when it will be back up!

Wait a good year or so....

Thats about when the replies come in xD
